mapper.select: SELECT WORK_START_TIME FROM TBL_WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_WORK SET WORK_DAY = SYSDATE, WORK_START_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
UPDATE TBL_WORK SET WORK_END_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(WORK_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_WORK JOIN TBL_WORK_REALTIME USING(WORK_NO) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY WORK_DAY DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('00:00:00', 'HH24:MI:SS') + AVG(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(WORK_START_TIME, 'SSSSS')))/86400, 'HH24:MI:SS') FROM TBL_WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('00:00:00', 'HH24:MI:SS') + AVG(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(WORK_END_TIME, 'SSSSS')))/86400, 'HH24:MI:SS') FROM TBL_WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
